transmissions
Class Transmission

java.lang.Object
  transmissions.Transmission
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Transmission>, DataConstants, Saveable
public class Transmission
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Transmission>, DataConstants, java.lang.Cloneable, Saveable

A transmissions can be sent between two transmitters and may contain data. A transmissions is also used to confirm receiving a transmissions previously.

Author:
Niels Thykier

Method Detail

generateConfirmationMessage

public Transmission generateConfirmationMessage()
Generates a confirmation Transmission to this Transmission. If this transmission was a send request, it will return a "Can receive" Transmission.

Returns:
A "received successfully" Transmission or a "Can receive" Transmission depending on this Transmission

Generates a send-request Transmission.

Parameters:
wishingToSendTo - The one to be receiving.
sendingFrom - The one wishing to send.
Returns:
The Transmission.

Description copied from interface: Saveable
